column3:
SCHOLARSHIPS

The Glasgow School of Art has a number of Scholarships available to new undergraduate and postgraduate students. The closing date for UNDERGRADUATE applications for 2007 (entry academic year 2007/8) is the 16th June 2007. The closing date for POSTGRADUATE applications is the 6th August 2007 (entry acdemic year 2007/8).

Each Scholarship has its own guidelines for applying and you should read each one carefully to ensure you only apply for those for which you are eligible. The guidelines can be found in A Guide to Scholarships at the GSA, which is available from Student Services (contact by email welfare@gsa.ac.uk or telephone +44 (0) 141 353 4509) or by downloading a PDF version using the links below.

Funding is usually for the first year of your course unless otherwise stated and you should ensure that you have sufficient funds to continue your studies once the Scholarship has ended.

Applying for Scholarships is easy and straightforward. A standard application form should be completed either by hand or electronically on-line via the GSA website. Remember to state clearly which scholarship(s) you are applying for as we cannot process general applications.

A GUIDE TO SCHOLARSHIPS AT THE GSA

Guide to Undergraduate Scholarships at the GSA (PDF)

Guide to Postgraduate Scholarships at the GSA (PDF)

Please note the Guides are updated on a regular basis.

APPLICATIONS FORMS

The application form and financial needs form are PDF files. Please complete BOTH forms and then save a copy to your hard drive before emailing to welfare@gsa.ac.uk. Please note, if you do not save the application form before sending it, the form we receive will be blank.

The application form asks for your signature. By submitting it electronically, the School will accept receipt as an electronic signature. Should you be awarded a scholarship, you will be asked to sign your application form.

If have any question about applying on-line, please contact Student Services +44 (0) 141 353 4509 or welfare@gsa.ac.uk

You can also print out the application form and sent to Student Services, The Glasgow School of Art, 167 Renfrew Street, Glasgow, United Kingdom, G3 6RQ if you prefer.

Scholarship Form (PDF)

Financial Needs Form (PDF)

Continuation Sheet Form (PDF)

Please visit this page regularly for updates, details of late applications and the closing date for applications for the forthcoming academic year.
